titleStmt.title: Eikon basilike deutera, The pourtraicture of His Sacred Majesty King Charles II with his reasons for turning Roman Catholick / published by K. James.
Eikon basilike.

notesStmt.note: "This is a malignant attack on Charles II, of unknown authorship, representing him as a Roman Catholic throughout"--Madan, New bibliography of the Eikon basilike, 132.
Reproduction of original in National Library of Scotland (Advocates')
